Installation and Configuration
The home website of TileCache is tilecache.org, where the source can be retrieved for installation. At the time of this writing, the current release is version 1.9. Retrieve the tar.gz file from the site and decompress with
$ zcat tilecache-1.9.tar.gz | tar xf -
Or, on a Linux system or other system with GNU tar available:
$ tar zxf tilecache-1.9.tar.gz
